name: Achieve (Pih_Interactives)
description:
Feeling down ? Need Refreshment ? You are at the right place.

 Achieve is a relaxing game where you join the  journey of a  a cute cube hustling towards his Goal, Build blocks for cube to jump on. Remember don't fly too high or get too low, both are destructive. Collect the confidence while dodging the negatives. Each play loop provides 2 games, Try to score maximum within those two rounds.
